data.name: Dice Gambit
data.detailed_description:
Dice Gambit is a turn based tactics game where you roll and allocate dice to control your characters in combat - you'll never have the same turn twice!

Adapt to the roll of the dice!

Optimize each turn according to your roll - or use a re-roll if you’re in a pinch!

All 6 sides matter!

Each side of the dice has an icon that corresponds to their own basic action:

Attack -- Move -- Defend -- Signature -- Cursed Joker

Combine Dice for Powerful abilities!

Double down or convert multiple dice into new and exciting effects!

Vibrant and Colorful Hand-Drawn World!

Experience a neo-renaissance metropolis inspired by southern Europe!

Customizable Progression!

Draft each of the 3 unique character's powers to discover synergies and create your own playstyle!

Adapt to each encounter!

Fight your way through 6 missions, each introducing new enemies and mechanics!

Defeat the Chromatic Knight!

Finish off with a tough-as-nails boss fight that will put your mastery to the test!



If you should want to follow the development more closely and be part of shaping the game, join our Discord!

data.short_description: A turn based tactics game where you roll and allocate dice to control your characters in combat. Completely customize your characters build with a huge array of powers that allow for boundless combinations. All set in a Neo-renaissance metropolis, filled with aristocratic families vying for power.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
